mdRecord.dcterms:title: Confirmations-Schein
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Evangelical Lutheran Church.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Gedruckt von Pfr. Ambrosius Henkel, fuer die confirmirte Jugend
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text within ornamental border;, with cuts of an angel at the top, two doves in the lower left corner, and grain, wrapped in a grape vine in the lower right corner.
First line of song: Sen Gott getreu, halt seinen Bund ...
On verso: within an ornamental border, "1827 / Philip Henkel. / No. / Preis"; "E.W. Rupert" printed along the right edge of the sheet.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Accompanied by a photocopy (negative) made from the original in the collection of Mrs. Henry Tusing of New Market, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Confirmation--Evangelical Lutheran Church
